title: Cook
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_happy>>
What's up?
<</Textbox>>
<<set $exampleTestimony to "CHOOOCOLAAAAATE">>
<<AddEntry CPT_LOG_TESTIMONY_Canvas $exampleTestimony cook_happy>>

<<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 is "Cook" or $Clue1Owner2 is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue1?|Cook.Question]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 is "Cook" or $Clue2Owner2 is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue2?|Cook.Question2]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 is "Cook" or $Clue3Owner2 is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue3?|Cook.Question3]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 is "Cook" or $Clue4Owner2 is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about this $Clue4?|Cook.Question4]]
<<endif>>


//    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 != "Cook" or $Clue1Owner2 != "Cook")>> 
//[[Cook.Redirect]]
//<<endif>>
    //<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 != "Cook" or $Clue2Owner2 != "Cook")>> 
//[[Cook.Redirect2]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 != "Cook" or $Clue3Owner2 != "Cook")>> 
//[[Cook.Redirect3]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != "Cook" or $Clue4Owner2 != "Cook")>> 
//[[Cook.Redirect4]]
//<<endif>>

//[[That's all.|Cook.Bye]]

title: Cook.Bye
body:
Cook
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I'll see you around.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>

//End of conversation

title: Cook.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Do you know anything about $Clue1?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
Oh that? That's mine
<</Textbox>>


[[I'll see you around.|Cook.Bye]]

[[I found it in $Clue1Location.|Cook.Clue]]

[[Are you sure?|Cook.Upset]]

title: Cook.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found it in $Clue1Location. Any ideas why?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_neutral>>
Why would it be in there?
<</Textbox>>

[[Why would someone would take it?|Cook.Key]]

[[Just gonna ask questions?|Cook.Upset]]

title: Cook.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Are you sure?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_mad>>
Are you the one who fixes this damn ship?
<</Textbox>>

<< if visited ("Cook.Loyalty")>>
[[Cook.Bye]]
<<endif>>

[[Cook.Loyalty]]
//End of conversation

title: Cook.Key
body:
Cook
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Any thoughts why someone would take it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_neutral>>
No clue, dude.
<</Textbox>>

//Clue Key Dialogue

[[Cook.Bye]]

body:

title: Cook.Loyalty
body: <<set $CookLoyalty to $CookLoyalty - 1>>

title: Cook.Redirect
body:
[[I found this.|Cook.RedirectClue]]

[[Nevermind.|Cook.Bye]]

title: Cook.RedirectClue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found this $Clue1. Can you tell me anything about it?
<</Text>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_Neutral>>
I'm busy right now, go bother $Clue1owner1 and $Clue1Owner2 with that.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Sure.
<</Text>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|Cook_Neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>
